CASE FILE ORGANIZATION COMPLETED: Comprehensive 5-phase file reorganization completed by Roscoe (AI Paralegal). 169 files successfully organized into 8-bucket directory system with 100% naming convention compliance. Phase 1: Generated inventory and scrambled 84 PDF filenames. Phase 2: Deployed 4 parallel sub-agents to analyze and map files. Phase 3: Quality review identified 6 errors (4.3% error rate) - all corrected. Phase 4: Executed 104 file operations (60 moves, 24 duplicate deletions). Phase 5: Verification confirmed success. Files now organized by: Case Information (16), Client (12), Investigation (2), Medical Records (48 across 9 providers), Insurance (13 across PIP/BI/UIM), Lien (12), Litigation (52), Reports (14). All files follow standard naming: YYYY-MM-DD - Client - Category - Originator - Description. All PDFs and emails have companion .md files for searchability. Case folder ready for efficient case management. Full reports saved to Reports/ directory.
episodes.natural_language:
Case file Shannon-Colvin-MVA-10-1-2023 for Shannon Colvin underwent a comprehensive five-phase file reorganization, led by Roscoe, an AI paralegal. A total of 169 files were organized into an eight-bucket directory system with 100% compliance to the established naming convention. Phase 1 generated an inventory and scrambled 84 PDF filenames. Phase 2 deployed four parallel sub-agents to analyze and map the files. Phase 3’s quality review identified six errors, a 4.3% error rate, and all were corrected. Phase 4 executed 104 file operations, including 60 moves and 24 duplicate deletions. Phase 5 verification confirmed success.

Files are now organized by category: Case Information (16), Client (12), Investigation (2), Medical Records (48 across 9 providers), Insurance (13 across PIP/BI/UIM), Lien (12), Litigation (52), and Reports (14). All files follow the standard naming format: YYYY-MM-DD - Client - Category - Originator - Description. To enhance searchability, every PDF and email has a companion .md file. The case folder is ready for efficient case management, with full reports saved to the Reports/ directory.
episodes.author: Roscoe (AI Paralegal)
